inn1.comm: short of a length outside off, nipped away after pitching, went for the cut and the keeper fumbled as the batsman missed
slightly short on middle and leg, turned away behind square for a single
Dilshan doesn't take too long to get going, short of a length and he gets on the back foot to punch it through the covers for four
in the channel outside off, goodish length and it moves away as Dilshan shoulders arms
goodish length and he cracks it confidently square, past point for three more runs
shortish on leg stump, tries to turn it behind square, clips the pads and they sneak a single
on a length on middle and leg, gets across and defends it cautiously into the leg side
down the leg side, tried to flick it fine, could not make contact there, wide given
on a good length, rocks forward and pushes it gently towards extra cover
Perera feasts on one that was bowled on leg stump, flicked it away, Jayasuriya style, over the short fine fielder
goes hard at one bowled on a good length outside off, tried to smash it through extra cover, missed
slightly short on leg stump, turns it into the leg side for a single
slightly short outside off, Dilshan went after that one but missed as it appeared to nip back in and keep just a little low
short on middle and Kushal picks up a boundary, pulling it through square leg for a boundary
slightly short on the off, rocks on the back foot and drops it down in front of point
slightly short on the off, punched through midwicket into the deep for a couple more runs
slower one outside off and that's been left alone to the keeper
slightly short on the off, rocks on the back foot and guides it towards point from the crease
slower one again outside off, leaves that one alone to the keeper
pitched up by Ziaur and it's there to drive, Dilshan went after it across the line and missed
goodish length on the off stump, that's been defended into the leg side towards midwicket
clipped away through square leg for a single into the deep
a bit of away movement after pitching, held it back a little, left that one alone to the keeper
on middle and leg, gets across and pushes it wide of midwicket for a single
Is that dropped? Shortish outside off, went for the pull, appeared to get an under-edge and Mushfiqur, diving to his left, could not hold on, had to dive low but was unable to grasp it
shortish on leg stump, easy pickings, tries to flick it fine, clips the thighs on the way to the fine-leg boundary
shortish on leg stump, tries to flick it fine, strikes him high on the pads

short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it towards midwicket, was Dilshan out of his crease when Nasir Hossain threw down the stumps at the non-striker's end? No, he was well in, an appeal for a run out has been turned down by the third umpire
short of a good length, pushed into the off side off the back foot, calls for a run, is sent back
back of a length and that's been punished, moved back and thrashed it through midwicket for a boundary
